function_v0.doc: Initialize the contract with the native XLM token address\nnative_token_addr should be the address of the native XLM Stellar Asset Contract
function_v0.name: initialize

function_v0.doc: Add a new contact (account can only add to their own contacts)
function_v0.name: add_cont

function_v0.doc: Edit an existing contact (account can only edit their own contacts)\nCannot edit contacts that have already been sponsored
function_v0.name: edit_contact

function_v0.doc: Delete a contact (account can only delete their own contacts)\nCannot delete contacts that have already been sponsored
function_v0.name: delete_contact

function_v0.doc: Get a specific contact by alias (account can only read their own contacts)
function_v0.name: get_contact

function_v0.doc: Get all contacts for the account (account can only read their own contacts)
function_v0.name: get_all_contacts

function_v0.doc: Get total number of contacts for the account
function_v0.name: get_contacts_count

function_v0.doc: Sponsor coffee by sending XLM equivalent to $5 USD to a contact\nFunction will be called through a smart wallet with coffee sponsor policy attached\nPolicy expects args: sponsor (Address), contact_alias (String)
function_v0.name: spon_coff

function_v0.doc: Get the current coffee sponsorship amount in stroops (XLM)
function_v0.name: get_coffee_amount

function_v0.doc: Check if a contact has been sponsored (public function for frontend use)
function_v0.name: is_contact_sponsored_by_user

function_v0.doc: Get all sponsored aliases for a user
function_v0.name: get_sponsored_aliases

function_v0.doc: Check if an address is already used by any contact for this user (public function for frontend use)
function_v0.name: is_address_used

function_v0.doc: Find which alias is using a specific address (returns empty string if not found)
function_v0.name: find_alias_by_address
